name: Mason Wooldridge
about: Undergraduate student at the University of Kentucky pursuing a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science, Mathematics, and Mathematical Economics. Enthusiastic about research in AI and education, particularly in intelligent tutoring systems for math. Actively involved in ACM, PDC, and tutoring, with interests in sports like basketball and tennis.

experience.title: Stocker
experience.description: Part-time summer position assisting with stocking and inventory management in a high-paced retail environment.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science, Mathematics, and Mathematical Economics

education.institution: The Gatton Academy of Mathematics and Science
